DOC.brief_summary: A single dose , two treatment ( two cephalexin suspension brand ) , two sequence , cross-over design use washout 7 day two study period . Treatment group balance number healthy volunteer randomly ( two stratum : male female ) assign study drug administration sequence .
DOC.brief_title: Cross-over Study Prove Bioequivalence Between Two Brands Cefalexin Suspension
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female volunteer age 18 55 year old normal vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , blood chemistry , liver function profile urinalysis History illnesses organic abnormality could affect result study History tobacco alcohol abuse regular use recreational therapeutic drug Subjects take medication within 14 day elimination period le 7 halflives ( whichever long ) study startup
